resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106949</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106949</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Wave Interference</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Störung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interférence de Vague</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interferência Da Onda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interferenza Dell'Onda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρέμβαση κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interferencia De la Onda</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Make waves with a dripping faucet, audio speaker, or laser! Add a second source or a pair of slits to create an interference pattern.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie Wellen mit einem Bratenfetthahn, einem 
Audiolautsprecher oder einem Laser! Fügen Sie einen 
Zweitlieferanten oder ein Paar Schlitze hinzu, um ein 
Interferenzmuster zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites les vagues avec un robinet d'égoutture, un
haut-parleur sonore, ou un laser ! Ajoutez une deuxième source 
ou une paire de fentes pour créer une configuration d'interférence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça ondas com um faucet do gotejamento, um 
altofalante audio, ou um laser! Adicione uma segunda fonte ou um
par das réguas para criar um teste padrão de interferência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia le onde con un rubinetto della 
sgocciolatura, un altoparlante audio, o un laser! Aggiunga una 
seconda sorgente o un accoppiamento delle fessure per creare un 
modello di interferenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνετε τα κύματα με μια στάζοντας στρόφιγγα, έναν 
ηχητικό ομιλητή, ή ένα λέιζερ! Προσθέστε μια δεύτερη 
πηγή ή ένα ζευγάρι των σχισμών για να δημιουργήσετε ένα 
πρότυπο παρέμβασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Haga las ondas con un grifo del goteo, un altavoz
audio, o un laser! Agregue una segunda fuente o un par de rajas 
para crear un modelo de interferencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106949</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/wave-interference</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
